gl_tigan: Admiralty charts are nautical charts issued by the United Kingdom Hydrographic Office and subject to Crown Copyright. Over 3, 300 charts are available and cover virtually the entire world in various levels of detail depending on the density of traffic and hazards. Large-scale charts often cover approaches and entrances to harbours, medium-scale charts cover heavily used coastal areas, and small-scale charts are for navigation in more open areas. There is also a Small Crafts Series available at even smaller scales. Mariners should always use the largest scale nautical chart appropriate to their needs. In particularly busy seaways such as the English Channel, Gulf of Suez and the Malacca and Singapore Straits, the standard nautical charts are supplemented by mariners’ routeing guides which provide advice on route planning in these complex areas. Charts include: depths (chart datum), coastline, buoyage, land and underwater contour lines, seabed composition (for anchoring), hazards, tidal information, prominent land features, traffic separation schemes, RF direction finding information, lights, and in short anything which could assist navigation.
gl_analysis: 英版海图由英国水道测量局出版并享有皇家版权。目前共有超过3300份海图可用，不仅覆盖全球海域，还因船舶和危险物密度差异而分为不同比例尺。大比例尺海图通常覆盖港口入口和进口，中等比例尺海图覆盖航行较多的沿岸海域，小比例尺海图则用于船舶在更加开阔的水域航行。此外还有更小比例尺的海图供小船使用。船员应使用适合其需求的最大比例尺海图。在一些特别繁忙的水域，如英吉利海峡，苏伊士湾，马六甲和新加坡海峡等地，使用标准海图时应以航路指南图作为补充，因其可为船员在此复杂水域内计划航路提供建议。海图上包括水深（海图基准面）、海岸线、浮标、陆地等高线和水下等深线、海底底质（用于锚泊），危险物、潮汐信息、显著陆标、分道通航制、无线电侧向信息、灯标等，总之，海图上有任何可协助航行的信息。

zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan: Admiralty charts are nautical charts issued by the United Kingdom Hydrographic Office and subject to Crown Copyright. Over 3, 300 charts are available and cover virtually the entire world in various levels of detail depending on the density of traffic and hazards. Large-scale charts often cover approaches and entrances to harbours, medium-scale charts cover heavily used coastal areas, and small-scale charts are for navigation in more open areas. There is also a Small Crafts Series available at even smaller scales. Mariners should always use the largest scale nautical chart appropriate to their needs. In particularly busy seaways such as the English Channel, Gulf of Suez and the Malacca and Singapore Straits, the standard nautical charts are supplemented by mariners’ routeing guides which provide advice on route planning in these complex areas. Charts include: depths (chart datum), coastline, buoyage, land and underwater contour lines, seabed composition (for anchoring), hazards, tidal information, prominent land features, traffic separation schemes, RF direction finding information, lights, and in short anything which could assist navigation.
gl_analysis: 英版海图由英国水道测量局出版并享有皇家版权。目前共有超过3300份海图可用，不仅覆盖全球海域，还因船舶和危险物密度差异而分为不同比例尺。大比例尺海图通常覆盖港口入口和进口，中等比例尺海图覆盖航行较多的沿岸海域，小比例尺海图则用于船舶在更加开阔的水域航行。此外还有更小比例尺的海图供小船使用。船员应使用适合其需求的最大比例尺海图。在一些特别繁忙的水域，如英吉利海峡，苏伊士湾，马六甲和新加坡海峡等地，使用标准海图时应以航路指南图作为补充，因其可为船员在此复杂水域内计划航路提供建议。海图上包括水深（海图基准面）、海岸线、浮标、陆地等高线和水下等深线、海底底质（用于锚泊），危险物、潮汐信息、显著陆标、分道通航制、无线电侧向信息、灯标等，总之，海图上有任何可协助航行的信息。

stem: 第1小题：_________are reprinted in the Annual Summary of Notices to Mariners.
analysis:
解析：【航路指南改正】会重印在航海通告年度摘要中。

______会重印在航海通告年度摘要中。

【参考答案】B. 航路指南改正
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan: Corrections to Sailing Directions are given in Section IV. Those in force at the end of the year are reprinted in the Annual Summary of Notices to Mariners. A list of corrections in force is published in Section IV of the Weekly Edition for the last week of each month. It is recommended that corrections be kept in a file with the latest list of corrections in force on top. The list should be consulted when using the parent book to see if any corrections affecting the area under consideration are in force. It is not recommended that corrections be stuck in the parent book or current supplement, but, if this is done, when a new supplement is received care must be taken to retain those corrections issued after the date of the new supplement, which may be several months be- fore its receipt on board.
gl_analysis:
【参考译文】航路指南的改正在第4部分中。那些到年底仍有效的改正会重印在航海通告年度摘要中。每个月最后一周的周版航海通告第四部分中会出版有效改正的列表。

建议将这些改正保存在文件夹中，并将有效改正的最新列表放在最上面。当使用母本航路指南查看任何相关区域的改正是否有效时，可以参考该列表。

不建议将这些改正粘贴在母本或现行的补篇中，但如果已粘贴的话，收到新补篇时，应仔细保留好那些在新补篇收到日期之后发布的改正，这些改正可能要等几个月才能在船上收到。

stem: 第1小题：The crossing traffic in the Dover Strait is probably running ______.
analysis:
多佛尔海峡内穿越船走向为【东南-西北】。

视频解析第一题有误  SE-NW是正确的。
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区
gl_tigan:
The area described in the volume presents the mariner with a generally adverse combination of navigational factors which are outline below.

The Dover Strait is shallow and only is 18 miles wide at its narrowest point. Passage through the strait is further constricted by a series of narrow banks, running NE-SW. The seabed is also littered with wrecks.

There are strong tidal streams in the strait. Sea level may differ from that predicted and in particular may be lower than expected due to negative tidal surges. The area is also subject to gales and poor visibility.

There is a high risk of collision caused by the density of vessel traffic on passage through the strait，including deep-draught vessels，and crossing traffic, including ferries and high speed craft.

There are two areas off the N coast of France, which remain dangerous because of mines lied in the war of 1939-1945. Due to the lapse of time the risk to surface navigation is now considered to be no more dangerous than that the ordinary risks of navigation but a very real risk still exists with regard to anchoring，fishing or any form submarine or seabed activity.
gl_analysis:

There are strong tidal streams in the strait. Sea level may differ from that predicted and in particular may be lower than expected due to negative tidal surges. The area is also subject to gales and poor visibility.

There is a high risk of collision caused by the density of vessel traffic on passage through the strait，including deep-draught vessels，and crossing traffic, including ferries and high speed craft.

There are two areas off the N coast of France, which remain dangerous because of mines lied in the war of 1939-1945. Due to the lapse of time the risk to surface navigation is now considered to be no more dangerous than that the ordinary risks of navigation but a very real risk still exists with regard to anchoring，fishing or any form submarine or seabed activity.

stem: 第1小题：The Admiralty TotalTide (DP 550) is ______.
analysis:
光盘版潮汐表（DP550）是______。

B. 基于个人电脑的潮汐预报程序
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan:
Admiralty TotalTide (DP 550) is a PC-based tidal prediction program which uses the same prediction algorithms and Harmonic Constants as the Admiralty Tide Tables，and has been designed to meet SOLAS carriage requirements.

Tidal heights for both Standard and Secondary Ports are displayed in graphical and tabular form. Tidal Stream rates are presented on a chart-based diagram.

TotalTide permits the mariner to select and simultaneously calculate tidal heights for multiple ports for up to seven days. Output from the system also includes periods of daylight and nautical twilight，moon phases and a springs and neaps indicator. Underkeel and overhead clearance can be displayed in a graphic form to aid passage planning.

TotalTide is supplied in the form of a single CD which contains the calculation program and the seven geographic Area Data Sets (ADS) providing global coverage. A permit system then provides access to the areas required. Annual updates for TotalTide are available from Admiralty Chart Agents，and are recommended.
gl_analysis:
光盘版潮汐表（DP550）是一个基于个人电脑的潮汐预报程序，它使用与英版潮汐表相同的预测算法和谐波常数，并且其设计符合SOLAS公约的配备要求。

主港和副港的潮高使用图标和表格显示。潮流速率以基于海图的图表进行呈现。

光盘版潮汐表使海员能够选择并同时计算多个港口长达七天的潮汐高度。该系统输出内容也包括白昼时长、海上黄昏、月相和大潮和小潮迹象等。龙骨以下和头顶净空以图形形式显示以协助航线设计。

光盘版潮汐表以一张CD的形式提供，其中包括计算程序和覆盖全球范围的七个地理区域数据集（ADS）。通过一许可系统，使用者可读取需要了解的海域。光盘版潮汐表每年更新一次，且建议从英版海图代理商处获取更新信息。

stem: 第1小题：The Nautical Almanac is published annually by ______.
analysis: 航海天文历每年由_____出版。A. 英国皇家文书局
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan:
The Nautical Almanac tabulates all data for the year required for the practice of astronomical navigation at sea.

It is compiled jointly by HM Nautical Almanac Office，Space Science and Technology Department，Rutherford Appleton Laboratory，Chilton，Didcot，United Kingdom，and The Nautical Almanac Office，United States Naval Observatory，and published annually by HM Stationery Office. It is obtainable through Admiralty Chart Agents，Thomas Gunn Online Shop and HM Stationery Office Bookshops，but not from the Hydrographic Office.

Star Finder and Identifier (NP 323) consists of diagrams on which are plotted the 57 stars listed on the daily pages of The Nautical Almanac，and on which the positions of the planets and other stars can be added. For a given Local Hour Angle (Aries) and latitude the elevation and true bearing of a star can be obtained by inspection.
gl_analysis:
航海天文历汇总了全年海上天文导航实践需要的所有数据。

航海天文历由英国英国迪德科特-奇尔顿-卢瑟福阿普尔顿实验室-空间科学技术部-皇家航海天文历办公室和美国海军天文台航海天文历办公室联合编制，每年由英国皇家文书局出版发行。该出版物可通过英版海图代理商、托马斯·冈恩线上商店和英国皇家文书局书店获取，但无法从英国水道测量局获取。

搜星图（NP323）中包括航海天文历每日页面上列举的57颗星标绘而成的图表，其上可以增补行星和其他星的位置。对于给定的地方时角（Aries）和纬度而言，一颗星的高度和真方位可通过检查获取。

航海天文历由英国英国迪德科特-奇尔顿-卢瑟福阿普尔顿实验室-空间科学技术部-皇家航海天文历办公室和美国海军天文台航海天文历办公室联合编制，每年由英国皇家文书局出版发行。该出版物可通过英版海图代理商、托马斯·冈恩线上商店和英国皇家文书局书店获取，但无法从英国水道测量局获取。

搜星图（NP323）中包括航海天文历每日页面上列举的57颗星标绘而成的图表，其上可以增补行星和其他星的位置。对于给定的地方时角（Aries）和纬度而言，一颗星的高度和真方位可通过检查获取。

analysis: 地球是一颗______。 行星
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan:
The Nautical Almanac tabulates all data for the year required for the practice of astronomical navigation at sea.

It is compiled jointly by HM Nautical Almanac Office，Space Science and Technology Department，Rutherford Appleton Laboratory，Chilton，Didcot，United Kingdom，and The Nautical Almanac Office，United States Naval Observatory，and published annually by HM Stationery Office. It is obtainable through Admiralty Chart Agents，Thomas Gunn Online Shop and HM Stationery Office Bookshops，but not from the Hydrographic Office.

Star Finder and Identifier (NP 323) consists of diagrams on which are plotted the 57 stars listed on the daily pages of The Nautical Almanac，and on which the positions of the planets and other stars can be added. For a given Local Hour Angle (Aries) and latitude the elevation and true bearing of a star can be obtained by inspection.

analysis:

【重点词汇】select选择；static data静态数据；IMO number国际海事组织编号；call sign呼号；navigation status航行状态；draught吃水；panel面板

本题有争议，C. navigation status是动态信息；D. ship’s draught是航次相关信息，但是公开题库给的答案是C，建议按照公开题库选择。

1. 静态信息

所谓静态信息是指AIS设备正常使用时，通常不需要变更的信息。静态信息包括MMSI、呼号和船名、IMO编号、船长和船宽、船舶类型、定位天线的位置等，

2. 动态信息

所谓动态信息是指能够通过传感器自动更新的船舶运动参数。动态信息包括船位信息， UTC时间，对地航速/航向，船首向，人工输入航行状态如失控（NUC）、在航、锚泊等，船舶旋回速率（ROT，如果有），吃水差（如果有）等，纵倾与横摇（如果有）。

3. 航次相关信息

所谓航次相关信息亦称航行相关信息，是指驾驶员输入的，隨航次而更新的船舶货运信息，包括船舶吃水、危险品货物、目的港/ETA、航线计划、开航前最大吃水等项目

4. 安全相关短消息’

所谓安全相关短消息亦称安全短消息，可以是固定格式的，如岸台发布的重要的航行警告、气象报告等，也可以是驾驶员输入的自由格式的，与航行安全相关的文本消息。

stem: 第1小题：As far as the sea and air temperatures in the open sea are concerned, which of the following statements is not true?
analysis:
解析：涉及大洋上的海水和空气温度时，哪项说法不正确？【夏季信风带沿岸，空气温度更低】。

【参考答案】D. 夏季信风带沿岸气温较低
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan:
TEMPERATURE 

Unlike pressure and winds, the day-to-day variation of sea temperature is very small; monthly changes of more than 1-2 ℃ are unusual, and year-to-year departures from the mean monthly value are of the same low order. In the open ocean, and along leeward shores, sea and air temperatures agree fairly closely (within 1 °℃ or so) ; thus August sea temperature off Scilly is approximately 15-16 ℃, and the average air temperature for the same place 17 ℃. Along windward shores, especially in high latitudes, differences up to 10-20 ℃, are not uncommon. Sometimes the air will be much colder than the sea (e. g. in high latitudes in the winter hemisphere) ; at others (e. g. in summer along Trade wind coasts) the sea will have the lower temperature. 

FOG 

Sea fog is likely to form wherever warm air passes over cold water. It is most likely to be persistent where the sea isotherms lying athwart the track of a wind blowing from warmer to colder waters are packed closely together. Area in which sea fog may be encountered on at least 5-10 days a month are indicated by a light stipple; 10-20 days a month areas are shown by a darker stipple.
gl_analysis:
温度：与气压和风不同，海水温度的日变化非常小；月变化超过1-2 ℃的情况很少见，年变化与平均月变化值之间的差距也很小。在大洋上和沿着下风岸的区域，海水和空气温度非常接近（大约在1度以内）；因此八月份Scilly沿岸海水温度约15-16 ℃，空气平均温度则保持在17 ℃。但沿着上风岸，特别在高纬度地区，海水和空气温度相差高达10-20 ℃的情况并不罕见（即很常见）。有时空气温度比海水温度低得多（如冬季高纬度地区），在其他区域海水温度则较低（如夏季信风带沿岸）。

雾：无论何时，当暖空气经过冷水面的时候，都可能形成海雾。当海上的等温线横跨从暖水域吹向冷水域的风之轨迹且这些等温线密集时，大多数情况下雾很可能持续较长时间。一个月内至少5-10天可能遇到海雾的区域用浅色点画来表示；一个月内10-20天有雾的区域则使用深色点画来表示。

stem: 第2小题：Sea fog is likely to form when warm air passes over cold water, so it is also called _________.
analysis:
解析：当暖空气通过冷水面很可能形成海雾，也叫作【平流雾】。

暖空气经过冷水面时容易形成海雾，故也称______。

【参考答案】D. 平流雾
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan:
TEMPERATURE 

Unlike pressure and winds, the day-to-day variation of sea temperature is very small; monthly changes of more than 1-2 ℃ are unusual, and year-to-year departures from the mean monthly value are of the same low order. In the open ocean, and along leeward shores, sea and air temperatures agree fairly closely (within 1 °℃ or so) ; thus August sea temperature off Scilly is approximately 15-16 ℃, and the average air temperature for the same place 17 ℃. Along windward shores, especially in high latitudes, differences up to 10-20 ℃, are not uncommon. Sometimes the air will be much colder than the sea (e. g. in high latitudes in the winter hemisphere) ; at others (e. g. in summer along Trade wind coasts) the sea will have the lower temperature. 

FOG 

Sea fog is likely to form wherever warm air passes over cold water. It is most likely to be persistent where the sea isotherms lying athwart the track of a wind blowing from warmer to colder waters are packed closely together. Area in which sea fog may be encountered on at least 5-10 days a month are indicated by a light stipple; 10-20 days a month areas are shown by a darker stipple.

stem: 第1小题：The process of superstructure icing formation depends upon all of the following factors except ______.
analysis:
船舶上层建筑结冰取决于下列因素，______除外。

A. 主机动力

【重点词汇】spray driven from wave crests波峰产生的飞沫；size and location of superstructure上层建筑的大小和位置；deposit of water droplets on the vessel's structure船舶结构上积聚的小水滴
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan: Superstructure icing is a complicated process that depends upon meteorological conditions，condition of loading，and behaviour of the vessel in stormy weather，as well as on the size and location of superstructure and rigging. The more common cause of ice formation is the deposit of water droplets on the vessel's structure. These droplets come from spray driven from wave crests and from ship-generated spray. Ice formation may also occur in conditions of snowfall，sea fog (including Arctic sea smoke)，a drastic fall in ambient temperature，and from the freezing of raindrops on contact with the vessel's structure. Ice formation may sometimes be caused or accentuated by water shipped on board and retained on deck.
gl_analysis: 船舶上层建筑结冰是一个复杂的过程，取决于气象条件、装货情况、船舶在风暴天气中运动，以及上层建筑及索具的大小和位置等。结冰较为常见的原因是船舶结构上水滴的积聚。这些水滴主要来自于波峰产生的飞沫和船舶运动产生的浪花。降雪、海雾（包括北冰洋烟雾）、环境温度急剧下降、以及船体结构上的雨滴结冰等情况下，也可能形成冰。船舶上浪以及积聚在甲板上的海水也可能导致或加重船舶结冰。

安达曼海（印度洋）、新加坡东部海域、巽他海峡、爪哇海、望佳锡海峡、苏拉威西海、马鲁古海及班达海海域：水平能间距离，低于10千米。

stem: If a vessel turns in shallow water, she will have _________advance than turns at deep water.
analysis:
解析：如船舶在浅水域旋回，进距会比在深水中【大】。三副公开题库选smaller是有问题的，船长大副的选larger；本平台按正确答案选。

船舶在浅水中航行与在深水中比较，操相同舵角时舵力变化不大，但浅水中旋回时阻力明显增加，因此旋回圈变大，旋回初径增加，进距约为旋回初径的0.6~1.2倍，二者成正比关系，所以进距也会相应的增加。

stem: 第1小题：The berthing angle is the angle between _________and _________.
analysis:
解析：船舶靠泊角是什么？______

【参考答案】C. 船首向与码头之间的夹角。
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan:
The berthing angle is the angle between heading and shoreline of the wharf. Usually, the berthing angle is not equal to the approaching angle. The approaching angle should be altered to the berthing angle prior to the ship’s lateral moving to the wharf. Altering the approaching angle, when there is a wide angle between the berth and the channel or fairway, is the process equivalent to a large angle of heading altering. The approaching angle is correlated to the area of touch at the time a ship contacts her berth. If berthing angle not O degree, the area of first touch maybe small, the hull of the ship may touch only one fender furnished at the wharf and may damage the structure of berth and/or the hull of herself if her transverse speed is a bit fast. Ship’s heading should be parallel to the wharf at the moment she contacts whatever the way is employed to move the ship close to her berth. 

Usually, the larger is the displacement, the smaller is the angle of close to be employed. The stronger is the current a full loaded ship moving against, the smaller is the angle. The stronger is the offshore wind, the larger is the angle for a light loaded ship. A ship of small size can employ a small berthing angle and of medium or large size must employ zero berthing angle to move laterally with ship’s heading kept parallel to the wharf as her huge inertia difficult to be controlled.
gl_analysis:
靠泊角是船首向与码头海岸线之间的夹角。通常，靠泊角与接近角不相等。船舶向码头横移之前，接近角应改为靠泊角。当泊位与航道之间成大角度时，改变接近角实际是船首向大角度变化的过程。船舶接近角与船舶接触泊位时船与泊位之间的接触面积有关。如靠泊角不是零度，（船与泊位之间）最初的接触面积可能很小，船舶船体只能接触到码头边安装的一个防碰垫。如果船舶横移速度较快, 就可能对泊位和/或自身船体造成损坏。无论船舶采用何种方式靠近码头，在船舶接触码头的那一刻，船首向都应平行于码头。

通常，船舶排水量越大，接近角越小越好。满载船的顶流越强，则接近角越小越好。离岸风越强，空载船的接近角越大越好。小型船可采用小靠泊角，因为中型或大型船舶的惯性较大难以控制，必须采用零度靠泊角，使船首向与码头保持平行。

stem: The track reach in the full astern stopping should not exceed _________ship lengths.
analysis:
解析：此题为公开题库第三版新增题目。

公开题库答案为20倍，答案错误！选A：15倍

【参考译文】全速倒车停船实验中，船舶航迹进距不得超过15倍船长。

【重点词汇】track reach航迹进距；full astern stopping全速倒车停船实验；exceed超出、超过

 Stopping test

The stopping test is performed to evaluate the stopping ability. A full astern stopping test is conducted to determine the track reach of ship from the time when an astern order is given until the ship is stopped dead in the water. The track reach is the length measured along the path of midship point, see Fig. 3. 3.

Fig. 3. 3 Path of the Midship Point During Stopping Test

Track Reach is defined as a distance along the vessel's track that the vessel covers from the moment that the “full astern” command is given until ahead speed changes sign.

Head Reach is defined as a distance along the direction of the course at the moment when the “full astern" command was given. The distance is measured from the moment when the “full astern” command is given until the vessel is stopped dead in the water.

The stopping ability of the vessel is judged using a full astern crash stop maneuver. Based on IMO requirements [IMO, 2002a], the track reach should generally not exceed 15 ship lengths  (measured along the path).

analysis: 解析：检查助航设备的目的是【确保船舶按照计划航线航行】。
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区
gl_tigan:
During the watch the course steered, position and speed shall be checked at sufficiently frequent intervals, using any available navigational aids necessary, to ensure the ship follows the planned course. The officer in charge of the navigational watch shall have full knowledge of the location and operation of all safety and navigational equipment on board the ship and shall be aware and take account of the operating limitations of such equipment. 

The officer in charge of the navigational watch shall not be assigned or undertake any duties which would interfere with the safe navigation of the ship. Officers of the navigational watch shall make the most effective use of all navigational equipment at their disposal. When using radar, the officer in charge of the navigational watch shall bear in mind the necessity to comply at all times with the provisions on the use of radar contained in the International Regulations for Preventing Collisions at Sea, in force.
gl_analysis: 值班期间，必要时应使用一切可用的助航设备，以足够频繁的间隔检查船位和船速，以确保船舶按照计划航线航行。负责值航行班的驾驶员应充分了解船上所有安全和助航设备的位置和操作情况，并应意识到并考虑到这些设备的操作局限性。值航行班的驾驶员不应被指派或承担任何妨碍船舶安全航行的任务。负责值航行班的驾驶员应当最有效地利用他们可使用的一切助航设备。在使用雷达时，负责值航行班的驾驶员应牢记必须始终遵守现行的《国际海上避碰规则》中有关使用雷达的规定。

gl_tigan: The vessel proceeding along the course of a narrow channel or fairway is obliged to keep “as near to the outer limit of the channel or fairway which lies on her starboard side as is safe and practicable”. The same Rule obliges a vessel of less than 20 m in length or a sailing vessel not to impede the passage of a vessel “which can safely navigate only within a narrow channel or fairway”. The Rule also forbids ships to cross a narrow channel or fairway “if such crossing impedes the passage of a vessel which can safely navigate only within such channel or fairway”. A new paragraph was added，stressing that a vessel which was required not to impede the passage of another vessel should take early action to allow sufficient sea room for the safe passage of the other vessel. Such vessel was obliged to fulfil this obligation also when taking avoiding action in accordance with the steering and sailing rules when risk of collision exists.
gl_analysis: 解析：沿狭水道或航道航行的船舶在确保安全和可行的情况下必须尽可能靠近其右舷航道或水道的外缘航行。同样的规则要求长度小于20米的船只或帆船不得妨碍“只能在狭水道或航道内安全航行”的船只通行。该规则还禁止船舶穿越狭水道或航道，“如果这样的交叉妨碍了只能在该航道或航道内安全航行的船舶通行”。增加了一个新的段落，强调一艘被要求不妨碍另一艘船通行的船只应尽早采取行动，为另一艘船的安全通行留出足够的水域。当存在碰撞风险时，此类船舶也有义务在根据规则采取转向和航速避让行动时履行这一义务。

option.C: the vessel of less than 20 m in length
option.D: the vessel of other than those of less than 20 m in length or sailing vessels

stem: 第1小题：______ is not the benefit of Rule 10.
analysis:
______不是第10条的好处。

zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan: In areas where traffic separation schemes did not exist the number of collisions rose sharply. New traffic separation schemes are introduced regularly and existing ones are amended when necessary to respond to changed traffic conditions. To enable this to be done as quickly as possible the MSC has been authorized to adopt and amend traffic separation schemes on behalf of the Organization. Rule 10 states that ships crossing traffic lanes are required to do so “as nearly as practicable at right angles to the general direction of traffic flow”. This reduces confusion to other ships as to the crossing vessel’s intentions and course and at the same time enables that vessel to cross the lane as quickly as possible.
gl_analysis: 在没有分道通航的地区，船舶碰撞事故急剧增加。定期引入新的分道通航，必要时对现有方案进行修改，以应对交通条件的变化。为了尽快完成这项工作，MSC已获授权代表本组织采用和修订分道通航。规则10规定，船舶必须“尽可能以与交通流总方向成直角的方式”穿越分道通航带。这就减少了其他船舶对交叉船意图和航向的混淆，同时使该船能够尽快通过航道。

gl_analysis: 在没有分道通航的地区，船舶碰撞事故急剧增加。定期引入新的分道通航，必要时对现有方案进行修改，以应对交通条件的变化。为了尽快完成这项工作，MSC已获授权代表本组织采用和修订分道通航。规则10规定，船舶必须“尽可能以与交通流总方向成直角的方式”穿越分道通航带。这就减少了其他船舶对交叉船意图和航向的混淆，同时使该船能够尽快通过航道。

option.B: enable the vessels not to cross the lane quickly
option.C: cause confusion to other ships as to the crossing vessel’s intentions and course
option.D: make it possible that all vessels will cross the schemes “as nearly as practicable at right angles to the general direction of traffic flow”

New traffic separation schemes are introduced regularly and existing ones are amended when necessary to respond to changed traffic conditions. To enable this to be done as quickly as possible the MSC has been authorized to adopt and amend traffic separation schemes on behalf of the Organization. Rule 10 states that ships crossing traffic lanes are required to do so “as nearly as practicable at right angles to the general direction of traffic flow”. This reduces confusion to other ships as to the crossing vessel’s intentions and course and at the same time enables that vessel to cross the lane as quickly as possible.

stem: 第1小题：What happened in the story?
analysis:
解析：【参考答案】C

【参考译文】文中发生了什么事？一油轮与一散货船相撞并溢出燃油。
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan: Sudden steering system failure of an oil tanker led to collision with a passing bulk carrier in the Baltic Sea. The collision resulted in serious damage to both vessels and spillage of 2, 700 tons of fuel oil from the tanker. The cause of the sudden steering failure could not be established. Small passing distance (0. 5 mile) between the two vessels precluded effective avoidance action being taken on both vessels. Both vessels unnecessarily restricted their passing distance by choosing the deep-water route although their relatively shallow draft permitted them to use the recommended directions of traffic flow outside the deep-water route. Vessels should avoid using deep-water routes when their draft permits them to use a traffic separation scheme. OOW should remain at heightened alert when passing another vessel at close range and should be vigilant for equipment failure and unexpected response from own or other vessel including interaction between vessels passing each other at close distances.
gl_analysis:
【参考译文】一艘油轮操舵系统突然故障，由此导致与一艘经过的散货船在波罗的海发生了碰撞。碰撞导致两船都遭受了严重的损坏，油轮溢出2700吨燃油。

目前还未能确定操舵装置突然发生故障的原因。两船之间很小的会遇距离（0.5海里）妨碍了双方采取有效的避让行动。尽管两船吃水较小，完全可以选择深水航路之外的推荐航路，但它们都不必要地选择了深水航路，这限制了它们的会遇距离。

当船舶吃水允许它们使用分道通航制时，应避免使用深水航路。两船近距离通过时，值班驾驶员应保持高度关注，并时刻警惕设备故障以及本船或他船的意外反应，其中包括两船近距离通过时的相互作用。

option.A: Improper maintenance led to the steering system failure.
option.C: There was not sufficient depth of water in the channel.
option.D: Both vessels chose the deep water route.

gl_tigan:
Rule 36

Signals to attract attention 

If necessary, to attract the attention of another vessel any vessel may make light or sound signals that cannot be mistaken for any signal authorized elsewhere in these Rules, or may direct the beam of her search light in the direction of the danger, in such a way as not to embarrass any vessel. Any light to attract the attention of another vessel shall be such that it cannot be mistaken for any aid to navigation. For the purpose of this Rule the use of high intensity intermittent or revolving lights, such as strobe lights, shall be avoided.
gl_analysis:
招引他船注意的信号

如需招引他船注意，任何船舶可以发出灯光或声响信号,但这种信号应不致被误认为本规则其他条款所准许的任何信号，或者可用不致妨碍任何船舶的方式把探照灯的光束朝着危险的方向。任何招引他船注意的灯光，应不致被误认为是任何助航标志的灯光。为此目的,应避免使用诸如频闪灯这样高亮度的间歇灯或旋转灯。

gl_tigan:
Rule 2

Nothing in these Rules shall exonerate any vessel, or the owner, master or crew thereof, from the consequences of any neglect to comply with these Rules or of the neglect of any precaution which may be required by the ordinary practice of seamen, or by the special circumstances of the case. 

In construing and complying with these Rules due regard shall be had to all dangers of navigation and collision and to any special circumstances, including the limitations of the vessels involved, which may make a departure from these Rules necessary to avoid immediate danger.
gl_analysis:
本规则条款不免除任何船舶或其所有人、船长或船员由于遵守本规则条款的任何疏忽，或者按海员通常做法或当时特殊情况所要求的任何戒备上的疏忽而产生的各种后果的责任。

在解释和遵行本规则条款规定时，应充分考虑一切航行和碰撞的危险，以及包括当事船舶条件限制在内的任何特殊情况，这些危险和特殊情况可能需要背离规则条款以避免紧迫危险。

Nothing in these Rules shall exonerate any vessel, or the owner, master or crew thereof, from the consequences of any neglect to comply with these Rules or of the neglect of any precaution which may be required by the ordinary practice of seamen, or by the special circumstances of the case. 

In construing and complying with these Rules due regard shall be had to all dangers of navigation and collision and to any special circumstances, including the limitations of the vessels involved, which may make a departure from these Rules necessary to avoid immediate danger.
gl_analysis:
本规则条款不免除任何船舶或其所有人、船长或船员由于遵守本规则条款的任何疏忽，或者按海员通常做法或当时特殊情况所要求的任何戒备上的疏忽而产生的各种后果的责任。

在解释和遵行本规则条款规定时，应充分考虑一切航行和碰撞的危险，以及包括当事船舶条件限制在内的任何特殊情况，这些危险和特殊情况可能需要背离规则条款以避免紧迫危险。

stem: 第4小题：The title of the passage may be _________.
analysis:
解析：本文的最佳标题是【船舶责任】。

本文是避碰规则的第二条，船舶责任。本规则中任何条款都不可以免除船方由于疏忽造成的后果。在解读、遵守本规则时，应充分考虑航行、碰撞危险，包括船舶的局限性，可能导致为避免紧迫危险而背离规则的情况。解析：1.exonerate使免责；2.consequence后果；3.precaution预防措施；4.ordinary practice通常做法；5.due regard适当的注意；6.departure from背离

stem: 第1小题：What happened in the story?
analysis: 解析：故事中发生了什么？【一艘游艇被经过的船舶撞到。】
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan:
A pleasure craft (8 meters) whilst anchored 28 miles from the nearest land for the night in a shipping lane off the North East coast of Australia, with all hands on board sleeping, was struck by a passing bulk carrier. Fortunately, there were no casualties. The collision went unnoticed by the OOW and the lookout on the bulk carrier. 

Available evidence indicates that proper radar and visual lookout was maintained on the bulk carrier. There could be several possible reasons for the pleasure craft not being observed on the bulk carrier: (i) pleasure craft presented a poor radar target; (ii) anchor light on the pleasure craft was too weak and did not comply with COLREGs; and (iii) reflection of moonlight from the water prevented the pleasure craft hull being seen from the bulk carrier bridge. Another contributory cause to the collision was the lack of a lookout on the pleasure craft which was anchored in a shipping lane at night. 

Numerous collisions occur between large ships and small craft every year resulting from lack of proper lookout on one or both vessels. All watch keepers need to be aware that small craft may not be readily sighted by radar or visually from the navigating bridge of large ships. The importance of proper lookout on all vessels, large and small, cannot be overemphasized and watch keepers shall also be guided by Rule 5 on Look-out of the COLREGs. Smaller ships should consider warning larger ships of any developing collision risk by using all available means including light signals, sound signals and radio communication. Larger ships must remember that provision of proper radar lookout does not obviate the need for effective visual lookout and vessels with operational radar shall be guided by Rule 6 (b) of the COLREGs. All ships including small craft, shall avoid anchoring in a known shipping lane.
gl_analysis:
一艘游艇(8米长)在离最近陆地28海里的澳大利亚东北海岸抛锚过夜，船上所有的人都在睡觉，被一艘路过的散货船撞击。所幸无人员伤亡。这艘散货船的值班驾驶员和瞭望员都没有注意到这次碰撞。

现有证据表明，该散货船保持了正规的雷达和视觉了望。散货船上没有发现游艇的原因可能有以下几个: (i) 游艇是较弱的雷达物标; (ii)游艇上的锚灯太弱，且不符合避碰规则; (iii)由于水中的月光反射，导致从散货船的驾驶台上无法看到游艇。另一个导致碰撞的原因是，游艇在夜间抛锚并停泊在一条航道上，且没有人监视。

每年都有大量碰撞事故发生于大型船舶和小型船舶之间，原因是其中一艘或两艘船缺乏正规瞭望。所有值班驾驶员必须注意，从大型船舶的驾驶台上，小型船舶可能不易被雷达或视觉发现。对于所有的船只，无论大小，正规瞭望的重要性再过分强调都不为过，值班驾驶员还应遵守COLREGs规则5关于瞭望的指导。小型船舶应考虑利用一切可用的手段，包括光信号、声音信号和无线电通信，向大型船舶发出有关发生碰撞危险的警告。大型船舶必须记住，进行正规雷达瞭望并不排除有效的视觉瞭望的需要，配备可操作雷达的船舶应遵循《避碰规则》第6 (b)条。所有船舶，包括小艇，应避免在已知航道抛锚。

option.A: Poor radar target of the bulk carrier.
option.C: Weak anchor light on the pleasure craft.

stem: 3/O ______how to carry and use the ______（自给式呼吸器） on the spot.(Drill records)
analysis:
此题为公开题库第三版新增题目。参考译文：三副现场展示怎样携带并使用SCBA。（演习记录）

重点词汇：demonstrate展示；示范；carry携带；SCBA=self-contained breathing apparatus自给式呼吸装置；on the spot在现场；drill演习；EEBD=emergency escape breathing device紧急逃生呼吸装置

SCBA control

Whenever personnel have to wear Self Contained Breathing Apparatus (SCBA), an Entry Control procedure is to be implemented as follows:

 (1) A responsible person will be delegated Controller.

 (2) After donning the SCBA and ancillary equipment as required and on the satisfactory completion of the initial tests, the wearer will report to the Controller before entering the “incident” area.

 (3) The Controller will record:

 (a) the name of wearer;

 (b) the identity of the SCBA set;

 (c) the air pressure of the cylinder showing on the pressure gauge;

 (d) the time the wearer reported to the Controller;

 (e) the time the wearer must report back to the Controller; which would normally be when the whistle on the set starts to sound.

 (4) If manning is such that a dedicated SCBA Controller cannot be appointed at site, an appointed officer on the Bridge shall be the Controller with information relayed by walkie-talkie.

 (5) The person wearing a SCBA on vacating a compartment and returning to fresh air atmosphere must report immediately to the Controller when his time is recorded of his safe return.

 (6) Should the wearer of a SCBA not report to the Controller at the appropriate time, he should be recalled from the scene of operation by walkie-talkie or other means of communication which has been set up before entry is permitted.

 (7) Should the wearer of a SCBA become overdue and no communication received, then a rescue must be mounted.

 (8) The SCBA instruction manual shows the working duration of the cylinders and is always advisable to take the worst state when calculating the duration of air in the cylinder as the exertion of the wearer may encounter is an unknown quantity.

 (9) It is better a person is recalled to the Control too early rather than too late.

stem: 第1小题：What happened to M/T PROSPERO on that day?
analysis: 解析：那天，成品油轮Prospero上发生了什么？【该船推进系统失灵】
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan: On January 10th 2006 an accident occurred in the product tanker Prospero due to failure of the vessel’s podded propulsion system. The incident took place at the Syllogistics Terminal, Milford Haven Wales, UK. As the vessel was approaching the No. 2 Jetty the podded propulsion system unexpectedly failed, resulting in loss of control of the vessel and subsequently its heavy contact with the terminals’ infrastructure, causing material damage to both the jetty and the vessel before control was regained.
gl_analysis: 2006年1月10日，由于船的吊舱式推进系统故障导致的事故发生在成品油轮Prospero上。该事件发生在英国米尔福德港威尔士的Syllogistics码头。当时船舶正在靠近二号码头，吊舱式推进系统意外失灵，导致船舶失控，随后与码头基础设施严重碰撞，在恢复控制之前，对码头和船身造成了破坏。

option.C: She has great damage to herself only.
option.D: Both the vessel and the terminal got damaged.

stem: 第1小题：What happened to “An Tai Jiang” on that day?
analysis: 解析：那天“安泰江”号发生了什么？【机舱着火】
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan: At about 1230 local time on 9 January 2009, a fire accident happened onboard the Hong Kong registered asphalt tanker “An Tai Jiang” when she was en route from Ulsan to Ningbo. The fire started inside the engine room and spread into accommodation spaces. The accident resulted in the deaths of the Third Engineer and a motorman inside the engine room, and another motorman lost at sea after falling into water. The engine room and crew accommodation sustained serious damage. There was no oil pollution to marine environment.
gl_analysis: 2009年1月9日，当地时间约12：30，香港籍船舶----“安泰江”号沥青运输船在由蔚山（韩国）驶往宁波的航程中发生火灾。火势从机舱内开始蔓延到居住空间。事故造成第二管员和机舱内一名机工死亡，另一名机工落水后失踪。机舱和船员生活区遭到严重损坏。对海洋环境未造成污染。

option.A: Two men dead and one man lost at sea.

gl_tigan:
While the internal auditing is carried out by the company itself yearly, the external auditing is carried out, every two to three years, by the officials of the country where the vessel is registered to. 

If the vessel has successfully incorporated all the safety requirements, then the officials issue it with a Certification of Safety Management or the Safety Management Certificate which brings the entire chain of a process to a fruitful completion.
gl_analysis:
内审，每年由公司自己开展，而外审，每两到三年，由船籍国的官方部门开展。

如果船舶成功地满足了所有的安全要求，那么官方就会向其颁发安全管理证书，从而使整个过程链卓有成效地完成。

stem: 第1小题：_________shall be verified conclusively as the company as per the ISM Code.
analysis: 解析：【承担国际安全管理规则所规定的所有责任和义务的组织】可以认定为公司。
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan:
Company means the owner of the ship or any other organization or person such as the manager, or the bareboat charterer, who has assumed the responsibility for operation of the ship from the shipowner and who, on assuming such responsibility, has agreed to take over all duties and responsibility imposed by the Code. 

So the company can be: 

-Owner of the ship 

-Any other organization 

-Bareboat charterer 

But most importantly, the company is the organization that has agreed to take over all the duties and responsibilities as per the ISM Code.
gl_analysis:
公司是船舶的所有人或者已承担船舶所有人的船舶营运责任，并在承担此种责任时同意承担本规则规定的所有责任和义务的组织，如管理人或光船承租人。

所以公司可以是:

-船东

-任何其它其他组织

-光船承租人

但最重要的是，公司是一个同意承担国际安全管理规则所规定的所有责任和义务的组织。

stem: 第1小题：ISM Code firstly came into in force by means of _________.
analysis: 解析：《国际安全管理规则》通过【国际海事组织A. 741(18)号决议】首次生效。
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan: The International Management Code for the Safe Operation of Ships and for Pollution Prevention  (ISM Code) was developed by the International Maritime Organization (IMO) to provide the maritime community with an internationally recognized standard for the safe management and operation of ships and pollution prevention. Initially adopted as resolution A. 741 (18), it later was incorporated into Chapter IX of the SOLAS Convention, it required that the Safety Management System (SMS) to be developed, implemented and maintained on ships and related Companies ashore and became mandatory for tankers,  bulk carriers and cargo high speed craft of 500 GRT and upwards and for passenger ships, passenger high-speed crafts from 1st July 1998. Other cargo ships and self-propelled mobile offshore drilling units (MODUs) of 500 GRT and upwards are also required to comply by SOLAS and became mandatory from 1st July 2002.
gl_analysis: 《国际船舶安全营运和防止污染管理规则》(ISM Code) （简称《国际安全管理规则》）是由国际海事组织(IMO)制定的，旨在为航海界提供船舶安全管理、安全营运和防止污染的国际公认标准。该规则最初作为A. 741(18)号决议获得通过，后来被纳入《海上人命安全公约》第九章，该规则要求在船舶和岸上相关公司制定、实施并保持安全管理系统(SMS)，并自1998年7月1日起，对油轮、散货船，500总吨及以上的高速船，客船，高速客船成为强制性规定，其他货船和500吨及以上的自行式移动式海上钻井平台(MODUs)也须符合《海上人命安全公约》的规定，并于2002年7月1日起成为强制性规定。

option.A: provide standard for safe management of ships
option.C: provide standard for safe operation of ships
option.D: provide standard for safe management and operation of ships and pollution prevention

stem: 第1小题：The key members of the crew for dealing with the spillage refer to ______.
analysis: 应对溢漏的主要船员指______。D. 甲板部驾驶员
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan: Emergency preparedness should form part of the ship’s Safety Management System as required by the ISM Code. Prepared information can reduce errors during a spillage emergency. Therefore，it is recommended that the EmS Schedule(S) be identified and included within the Dangerous Goods Manifest and Stowage Plan，so directly connected to the stowage position of the cargo. This will enable key members of the crew to know in advance which emergency procedures would be necessary. In the event of a spillage，the allocation of a specific EmS SPILLAGE SCHEDULE via identification of the cargo via the UN Number takes time and is open to error，especially in mixed cargoes in one container. Furthermore，some spillage response procedures may require specific use of material which could be hampered by an inaccessible stowage location. After locating the spillage area，the advice given in the EmS SPILLAGE SCHEDULE should be directly available from the Dangerous Goods Manifest and Stowage Plan.
gl_analysis: 根据ISM规则要求，应急准备应构成船舶安全管理体系的一部分。事先准备的信息能够减少溢漏紧急情况下的失误。因此建议对EmS Schedule即船舶载运危险货物应急措施进行确认并将其纳入危险货舱单和积载图，以此直接与货物积载位置相关联。这将使主要船员能够提前了解哪些是必要的应急程序。一旦发生溢漏，需要花时间通过UN编号、再通过识别货物确定某一项特定EmS溢漏应急措施，此过程中极易发生失误，特别是一个集装箱内混在一起的货物。此外，一些溢漏反应程序可能需要使用特定的材料，但获取这些材料可能由于其积载位置无法进入而受阻。找到溢漏位置后，应能从危险货舱单和积载图中找到EmS溢漏应急措施中所提供的建议。

analysis: 溢漏应急程序应包括在______。EmS溢漏应急程序

stem: Which tool can be used to measure the target’s range and bearing accurately on marine radar?

解析：在船用雷达中哪一种工具能准确测量目标方位和距离？ERBL电子方位线；

与固定距标圈同心的虚线圆是活动距标圈（Variable Range Marker，VRM），它可以由操作者随意调整半径，借助数据读出窗口的指示测量目标的准确距离。EBL（EIecmmiC BearingLinejBL）称为电子方位线，可以通过面板操作，控制其在屏幕的指向，借助数据读出窗口的指示或屏幕边缘显示的方位刻度，测量目标的方位。很多雷达将VRM/EBL联动，称为电子距离方位线（Electronic range/bearing line，ERBL），可以通过一次性操作同时测量目标的距离和方位。现代雷达用平面光栅显示器取代了PPI

【参考答案】D. ERBL

gl_tigan: The speed error of gyro compass is the difference between the course indicated by the gyro compass and the true course. The underlying causes of this error, which is governed by the ship’s speed, course and local latitude, are of the physical type. The speed error must be corrected as described below. For amount and sign of speed error, see Speed Error Table as followed. The true course equals the compass course taking into account the correction value drawn from the speed error table.
gl_analysis: 电罗经的速度误差是指电罗经所指示的航向与实际航向之间的差值。这种误差是由航速、航线和当地纬度决定的，其根本原因是物理性决定的。速度误差必须按照下面的描述进行修正。速度误差的数量和符号见以下速度误差表。真航向等于罗航向+速度误差表的修正值。

stem: 第1小题：When the gyro rotor has reached to normal revolution, ______ will illuminate.
analysis:
当陀螺转子达到正常转速后，______将亮起。

主罗经操作面板“运行”灯
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区
gl_tigan:
The gyro-compass takes around 4 hours until stabilized. Therefore，automatic steering of the system should be performed after 4 hours elapsed since the gyro-compass started up. A gyro compass is started as following procedures：

Set “Latitude Correction Knob” to current latitude of the own ship.

Turn on “Power Supply Switch” of the power supply unit and confirm that “Power Supply Indicator” of the power supply unit is lit.

 Turn on “Power Supply Switch” of master compass and confirm “START” indication lamp of the master compass operating panel is lit; Also confirm that “Repeater” power supply indicating lamp of the master compass operating panel is lit.

    After “POWER” switch of the master compass turned on，“RUNNING” lamp of the master compass operating panel illuminates within 5 minutes，and indicates that the gyro rotor has reached to normal revolution.

    After confirmed that “REPEATER” power supply indicating lamp of the master compass is lit，synchronize the repeater bearing to match the master compass bearing.
gl_analysis:
陀螺罗经大约需4小时方可稳定工作。因此，陀螺罗经启动后，需经4个小时才可以实现自动操纵。应遵守下列程序启动陀螺罗经：

将“纬度修正旋钮”设置为本船当前纬度。

开启供电装置的“电源开关”，确保“供电指示器”灯亮。

打开主罗经“电源开关”，确认主罗经操作面板“启动”指示灯亮；同时确认主罗经操作面板“分罗经”电源指示灯亮。

主罗经“电源”开关开启后，5分钟内主罗经操作面板“运行”灯会亮起，表明陀螺转子已达到正常转速。

确认主罗经之“分罗经”电源指示灯亮起后，将分罗经方位与主罗经同步。

option.A: confirm that “REPEATER” power supply indicating lamp of the master compass is lit
option.B: turn on “Power Supply Switch” of the power supply unit
option.C: turn on “Power Supply Switch” of the master compass

The gyro-compass takes around 4 hours until stabilized. Therefore，automatic steering of the system should be performed after 4 hours elapsed since the gyro-compass started up. A gyro compass is started as following procedures：

Set “Latitude Correction Knob” to current latitude of the own ship.

Turn on “Power Supply Switch” of the power supply unit and confirm that “Power Supply Indicator” of the power supply unit is lit.

 Turn on “Power Supply Switch” of master compass and confirm “START” indication lamp of the master compass operating panel is lit; Also confirm that “Repeater” power supply indicating lamp of the master compass operating panel is lit.

    After “POWER” switch of the master compass turned on，“RUNNING” lamp of the master compass operating panel illuminates within 5 minutes，and indicates that the gyro rotor has reached to normal revolution.

    After confirmed that “REPEATER” power supply indicating lamp of the master compass is lit，synchronize the repeater bearing to match the master compass bearing.

将“纬度修正旋钮”设置为本船当前纬度。

打开主罗经“电源开关”，确认主罗经操作面板“启动”指示灯亮；同时确认主罗经操作面板“分罗经”电源指示灯亮。

主罗经“电源”开关开启后，5分钟内主罗经操作面板“运行”灯会亮起，表明陀螺转子已达到正常转速。

确认主罗经之“分罗经”电源指示灯亮起后，将分罗经方位与主罗经同步。

stem: 第1小题：______ should be checked most frequently.
analysis: ______应经常核查。C. 驾驶台分罗经
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan: It is recommended that the gyro compass should be run continuously. Should a gyro compass stop for any reason，it should be restarted and subsequently checked before use to ensure it has settled and is reading correctly. Speed and latitude corrections need to be applied to the gyro compass. The gyro will support a number of repeaters，including a repeater at the emergency steering position. Gyro repeaters on the bridge should be checked against the main gyro at least once a watch，and after excessive manoeuvring. Other repeaters should be checked frequently. Magnetic and gyro compass errors should be checked and recorded each watch，where possible，using either azimuth or transit bearings. A record of magnetic and gyro compass courses to steer and compass errors should be maintained available to the helmsman.
gl_analysis: 建议陀螺罗经应保持运转状态。如陀螺罗经因任何原因停止工作，那么重启后应马上进行核查，确保其运转稳定且读数正确后方可使用。陀螺罗经应进行速纬校正。陀螺罗经可支持多个分罗经，其中包括应急操作位置的分罗经。驾驶台分罗经应至少每个班与主罗经核对一次，船舶长时间操纵后也应如此。其他分罗经应经常核查。如可能，磁罗经和陀螺罗经误差应每个班使用方位角或串视方位核查并记录。舵工应能随时了解操纵的磁罗经和陀螺罗经航向以及罗经误差的记录。

stem: 第1小题：The navigator can see the outline，displayed on a ______ by a pen recorder of the echo sounder，of the bottom over which the vessel is passing.
analysis: 船员可看到回声测试仪的描笔式记录器在一______上显示出船舶航经区域的海底轮廓。B. 专用图像
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan: The echo sounder sends a sound signal from the bottom of the ship to the sea-bed，from which it is reflected. The time taken to receive the reflected signal is a measure of the depth of water under the ship. The received pulse is displayed on a chart by a pen recorder so that the navigator can see the outline of the bottom over which the vessel is passing. A similar device is the sonar system，which uses high frequency sound signals. In sonar the sound signal can be sent ahead or sideways. The time for the echo to be sent back from an object，such as an underwater rock，is a measure of the object’s distance from the ship. The sonar system can also be used to measure the speed of the ship over the seabed.
gl_analysis: 回声测深仪从船底向海底发射声波信号，该信号再由海底反射回来。根据接收反射信号所需的时间，就可以测量船舶下方的水深。描笔式记录器将接收到的脉冲信号显示在图像上，便于船员看到船舶航经区域的海底轮廓。另一类似装置是使用高频声波信号的声呐系统。声呐系统声波信号可向前方或侧面发送。根据回声从物标（如一水下岩石）反射回来所需的时间，即可测量出该物标与船舶之间的距离。声呐系统也可用于测量船舶相对海底的速度。

option.A: the depth of water under the ship
option.C: the speed of the ship over the sea-bed
option.D: the speed of the ship relative to sea water

gl_tigan: The echo sounder sends a sound signal from the bottom of the ship to the sea-bed，from which it is reflected. The time taken to receive the reflected signal is a measure of the depth of water under the ship. The received pulse is displayed on a chart by a pen recorder so that the navigator can see the outline of the bottom over which the vessel is passing. A similar device is the sonar system，which uses high frequency sound signals. In sonar the sound signal can be sent ahead or sideways. The time for the echo to be sent back from an object，such as an underwater rock，is a measure of the object’s distance from the ship. The sonar system can also be used to measure the speed of the ship over the seabed.
gl_analysis: 回声测深仪从船底向海底发射声波信号，该信号再由海底反射回来。根据接收反射信号所需的时间，就可以测量船舶下方的水深。描笔式记录器将接收到的脉冲信号显示在图像上，便于船员看到船舶航经区域的海底轮廓。另一类似装置是使用高频声波信号的声呐系统。声呐系统声波信号可向前方或侧面发送。根据回声从物标（如一水下岩石）反射回来所需的时间，即可测量出该物标与船舶之间的距离。声呐系统也可用于测量船舶相对海底的速度。

stem: 第1小题：If the location of sensor is too close to the propeller, the reading of the speed log DS-80 may be _________.
analysis:
解析：如果传感器的位置太接近螺旋桨，DS-80计程仪的读数可能是【不精确】。

如传感器的位置太靠近螺旋桨，DS-80计速仪读数可能______。

【参考答案】D. 不准确
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan:
The Doppler speed log DS-80 is designed for reliable and accurate performance through FURU- NO’s long experience and advanced technology. It operates on the best choice of system frequency and power output. As far as the sonic energy is used, the performance (accuracy) may be reduced or even lost under: 

• rough weather (may be sea state 6 or severer) 

• improper location of sensor, e. g., too close to the propeller, thrusters, drain tubes, echo sounder transducer 

• depth under the keel if less than 3 m 

The accuracy will not be affected by: 

• water temperature (sound velocity) 

• salinity 

• pitch/roll ±10°
gl_analysis:
通过FURU- NO（日本的一种型号）长期的经验和先进的技术，DS-80多普勒计程仪性能可靠和准确。选择最佳的系统频率和功率，即可运行。只要使用声能，在以下情况下，性能(精度)可能会降低甚至丧失:

•恶劣天气(可能是海况6级或更严重)

•传感器位置不当，例如，太靠近螺旋桨，推进器，排水管，回声传感器

•龙骨以下水深若小于3米

精度不受以下因素影响:

•水温(声速)

•盐度

•纵摇/横摇±10°

stem: 第1小题：The speed log _________.
analysis:
解析：计程仪【可以单独显示速度】。

计程仪______。

【参考答案】A. 只能显示速度
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan:
To select a display on the speed log unit, press the [DISP] key to select display desired. Each time the key is pressed the display shows speed and distance run or speed alone as below. 

• Arrow indicates direction: ▲indicates fore; ▼indicates aft. 

• The distance run indication shows the total distance run in forward speed only. 

• The distance run is backed up when the power is turned off. 

Speed error may occur in rough seas because of air bubbles, etc. When speed error occurs, the speed indication freezes, and “KT” is highlighted and blinks. If speed error continues more than 30 seconds, the speed indication changes to **. *.
gl_analysis:
要在计程仪上选择一个显示模式，按[DISP]键选择所需显示的。每次按下按键，显示屏就会显示速度和距离或仅显示速度，具体如下。

•箭头表示方向:▲表示前;▼表明后。

•航行距离显示的仅仅是前进时航行的总距离。

•断电时，航行距离的显示将会备份。

由于气泡等原因，在波涛汹涌的海面上可能会出现速度误差。当出现速度误差时，速度指示冻结，“KT”亮起并闪烁。如果速度误差持续超过30秒，速度显示变为**.*。

option.D: The distance run will not be stored when the power is turned off.

zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan:
Class A AIS provides three types of information. 

Fixed, or static information, which is entered into the AIS on installation and need only be changed if the ship changes its name or undergoes a major conversion from one ship type to another. Includes data such as: MMSI, Call sign and name of vessel, IMO Number, Length and beam, Type of ship, Location of position-fixing antenna. 

Dynamic information, which, apart from navigational status information, is automatically updated from the ship sensors connected to AIS. Includes: Ship’s position with accuracy indication and integrity status, Position Time stamp in UTC, Course over ground, Speed over ground, Heading, Navigational status (e. g. underway by engines, at anchor, engaged in fishing etc), Rate of turn. 

Voyage-related information, which might need to be manually entered and updated. Such as: Ship’s draught, 

Hazardous cargo (type), Harmful substances, or Marine pollutants, Destination and ETA, Route plan (at the discretion of the master).
gl_analysis:
A类AIS（自动识别系统）提供三种类型的信息。

固定或静态信息（在AIS系统安装时输入的），只有当船舶更改名称或从一种船型进行重大转换时才需要更改。包括数据如:MMSI，船舶呼号和船名，IMO编号，船长和船宽，船舶类型，定位天线的位置。

动态信息，除了导航状态信息外，还可以通过连接到AIS的船舶传感器自动更新。包括:精确船位及完整状态，位置时间以UTC标注，对地航向，对地航速，首向，航行状态(例如，在航，抛锚，从事捕鱼等)，转向率。

与航行相关的信息，可能需要手动输入和更新。如:船舶吃水，危险货物(类型)，有害物质或海洋污染物，目的地和预计到港时间，航线计划(由船长决定)。

gl_tigan: A global navigation satellite system is a satellite system that provides ships fitted with suitable receivers with a means of obtaining continuous worldwide position，time and speed information. The Global Positioning System (GPS) operated by the United States and the Global Navigation Satellite System(GLONASS) operated by the Russian Federation are currently available for civilian use on ships. GPS offers commercial users a global positioning capability with accuracy of the order of 100 metres. Differential GPS (DGPS) receivers apply corrections to raw GPS signals determined and transmitted by terrestrial monitoring stations. Differential signals can be transmitted to ships via satellites or using HF radio links. Within DGPS coverage，positional accuracy of the order of 10 metres at the receiver antenna is possible.
gl_analysis: 全球导航卫星系统是一种为安装有适当接收机的船舶提供持续获取全球船位、时间和速度信息的卫星系统。目前民用船舶主要使用由美国营运的全球定位系统（GPS）和俄罗斯联邦营运的全球导航卫星系统（GLONASS）。GPS为商业用户提供的全球定位能力大约为100米。差分全球定位系统（DGPS）接收机对地面监控站确定和发送的原始GPS信号进行修正。通过卫星或使用高频无线电连接将差分信号发送给船舶。在DGPS覆盖范围内，可能实现接收机方圆10米内的位置精度。

gl_tigan: A global navigation satellite system is a satellite system that provides ships fitted with suitable receivers with a means of obtaining continuous worldwide position，time and speed information. The Global Positioning System (GPS) operated by the United States and the Global Navigation Satellite System(GLONASS) operated by the Russian Federation are currently available for civilian use on ships. GPS offers commercial users a global positioning capability with accuracy of the order of 100 metres. Differential GPS (DGPS) receivers apply corrections to raw GPS signals determined and transmitted by terrestrial monitoring stations. Differential signals can be transmitted to ships via satellites or using HF radio links. Within DGPS coverage，positional accuracy of the order of 10 metres at the receiver antenna is possible.

stem: 第1小题：The purpose of the microphones is _________.
analysis:
解析：麦克风的用途是【记录驾驶台的音频】

麦克风的作用是______。

【参考答案】B. 为记录驾驶台音频
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan: The VDR can be classified to contain following units, the Data Collection Unit (DCU), a Data Recording Unit (DRU) and microphones to record bridge audio. The DCU should be fitted on the bridge that pulls in data from all the integrated sources. It contains the Data Processor Unit, interface modules and backup batteries. It collects data from sensors as required by the IMO and IEC standards. The batteries supply power to the DCU to record bridge audio for 2 h in case of a main ship’s power failure. The DRU should be fitted on the monkey island that stores all of the data that is recorded via the unit within the wheelhouse. The flash memory in the DRU stores the data coming from the DCU. The data can be retrieved by using playback software for investigation after an incident. The DRU components are embodied in the protective capsule. The capsule ensures survival and recovery of the recorded data after an incident.
gl_analysis: VDR（航行数据记录仪）可以分为以下几个单元，数据采集单元(DCU)，数据记录单元(DRU)和用于记录驾驶台音频的麦克风。DCU应该安装在驾驶台上，从所有综合（数据）来源收集数据。它包括数据处理器单元、接口模块和备用电池。它根据国际海事组织和IEC标准的要求从传感器收集数据。电池为DCU供电，在主船断电的情况下，可记录驾驶台音频2小时。DRU应该安装在罗经甲板上，以存储操舵室内记录单元所收集的所有数据。DRU中的闪存存储来自DCU的数据。数据可以通过回放软件检索，用于事件后的调查。DRU组件包含在保护舱中。太空舱可确保事故发生后（数据）的保存和所记录数据的恢复。

option.A: the Data Processor Unit, interface modules and backup batteries

stem: 第1小题：Tap the buttons [SAVE] and [PROTECT] successively, _________will be displayed.
analysis:
解析：相继按【保存】键和 [PROTECT]键，将进入【数据保护】界面。

依次点击[保存]和[保护]按钮，显示______。

【参考答案】B. 数据保护
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan:
In the event of an accident, check the situation, and preserve the recorded data by the VDR immediately. 

Tap the [SAVE] button and display the “Save the recorded data at a marine accident case". Tap The [PROTECT] button. The DATA PROTECT screen is displayed. 

Using four buttons [DAY+], [DAY-], [HOUR+] and [HOUR-], set the cursor center to the date and time when the accident occurred. As center on the cursor, the recorded data is preserved from three hours before to three hours after. The recorded data is preserved a total of six hours. Tapping the [SELECT] button, then the drop-down list is displayed. Select the destination save area to save the preserved data. Tapping the [PROTECT] button, then the chosen recorded data is preserved. 

If the AC input power source is lost, the data recording stops after two hours. If evacuation is necessary, no need to preserve the recorded data. By collecting the fixed protective capsule unit and capsule unit, the relevant authorities can collect the recorded data.
gl_analysis:
当发生事故时，检查情况，并立即保存VDR（航行数据记录仪）记录的数据。

轻按【保存】键，显示“保存海上事故的记录数据”。点击[PROTECT]按钮。进入“数据保护”界面。

使用[DAY+]、[DAY-]、[HOUR+]、[HOUR-]四个按钮，用光标中心设置事故发生的日期和时间。作为光标的中心，记录的数据，从该时间点的前三小时保存到改时间点的后三小时。记录的数据总共保存了6个小时。点击[SELECT]按钮，显示下拉列表。选择目标保存区域保存保存的数据。点击[PROTECT]按钮，选择的记录数据将被保存。

如果交流输入电源断电，两个小时后数据记录停止。如果急需撤离，则不需要保存记录的数据。有关部门可以通过收集固定数据保护舱和保护单元，收集所记录的数据。

If the AC input power source is lost, the data recording stops after two hours. If evacuation is necessary, no need to preserve the recorded data. By collecting the fixed protective capsule unit and capsule unit, the relevant authorities can collect the recorded data.

gl_tigan:
The Long Range Identification and Tracking (LRIT) of ships was established as an international system on 19 May 2006 by the International Maritime Organization. 

The LRIT regulation will apply to the following ship types engaged on international voyages: 

All passenger ships including high-speed craft; 

Cargo ships, including high speed craft of 300 gross tonnage and above; and 

Mobile offshore drilling units. 

These ships must report their position to their Flag Administration at least four times a day. The LRIT information ships will be required to transmit include the ship’ s identity, location and date and time of the position. There will be no interface between LRIT and AIS. One of the more important distinctions between LRIT and AIS, apart from the obvious one of range, is that, whereas AIS is a broadcast system, data derived through LRIT will be available only to the recipients who are entitled to receive such information and safeguards concerning the confidentiality of those data have been built into the regulatory provisions. SOLAS Contracting Governments will be entitled to receive information about ships navigating within a distance not exceeding 1, 000 nautical miles off their coast.
gl_analysis:
船舶远程识别和跟踪(LRIT)是由国际海事组织于2006年5月19日建立的一个国际系统。

LRIT规则适用于下列从事国际航行船舶类型:

所有客船，包括高速客船;

货船，包括300总吨及以上的高速船;和

移动式海上钻井装置。

这些船舶每天必须至少四次向船旗局报告其位置。船舶须将发送的LRIT信息包括船的识别信息，船位，在该位置的日期和时间。LRIT和AIS之间没有接口。除了明显的距离差别之外，LRIT和AIS之间的一个更显著的区别，是AIS是一个广播系统，而通过LRIT获得的数据，将只提供给有权获得该信息的接收方，有关这些数据保密的保障措施已纳入监管规定。《海上人命安全公约》缔约方政府将有权获得在距其海岸不超过1,000海里范围内航行的船舶的信息。

option.D: Date and time of the reported position.

stem: 第1小题：In this passage, the “system” is _________.
analysis:
解析：本文中，“系统”是指【船舶保安报警系统】。

本段中，the “system”指______。

【参考答案】D. SSAS
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan:
The system is intended for transmitting the security alert when the ship is under attack by pirates, terrorists, etc. It notifies the preset flag administration on land that the ship is under threat, without generating any audio/visual alarms to prevent others onboard from sensing that a security alert is transmitted. Its multi-addressed transmission function enables the transmission of the reports to the ship owner as well as to the flag administration. 

The information transmitted includes ship’ s current position and identification. Ship’ s position, obtained by using the built-in GPS receiver, is sent at regular intervals so that the flag administration and the ship owner are kept informed of the position of the ship. 

An optional backup battery is available to drive the system up to five days for continual data transmission. Furthermore, its polling function enables the tracking of a ship even after the ship loses communication due to the disturbances caused by pirates.
gl_analysis:
该系统用于船舶受到海盗、恐怖分子等攻击时发送安全警报。它通知预先设置的陆上的船旗国主管机构船舶受到威胁，而不产生任何音频/视觉警报，以防止船上其他人感知到安全警报传输。其多址传输功能可以将报告传送给船东和船旗国主管机构。

所传输的信息包括船舶当前位置和识别信息。船舶的位置通过内置的GPS接收器获得，并定期发送，使船旗国主管机构和船东随时获取船舶的位置。

一个可选的备用电池可以驱动系统连续进行数据传输，时长可达5天。此外，它的轮询功能可以使船舶即使由于海盗的干扰而失联，也可以跟踪船舶。

【参考答案】A.①船旗国政府;②船东

Its multi-addressed transmission function enables the transmission of the reports to the ship owner as well as to the flag administration. 

The information transmitted includes ship’ s current position and identification. Ship’ s position, obtained by using the built-in GPS receiver, is sent at regular intervals so that the flag administration and the ship owner are kept informed of the position of the ship. 

An optional backup battery is available to drive the system up to five days for continual data transmission. Furthermore, its polling function enables the tracking of a ship even after the ship loses communication due to the disturbances caused by pirates.
gl_analysis:
该系统用于船舶受到海盗、恐怖分子等攻击时发送安全警报。它通知预先设置的陆上的船旗国主管机构船舶受到威胁，而不产生任何音频/视觉警报，以防止船上其他人感知到安全警报传输。其多址传输功能可以将报告传送给船东和船旗国主管机构。

所传输的信息包括船舶当前位置和识别信息。船舶的位置通过内置的GPS接收器获得，并定期发送，使船旗国主管机构和船东随时获取船舶的位置。

一个可选的备用电池可以驱动系统连续进行数据传输，时长可达5天。此外，它的轮询功能可以使船舶即使由于海盗的干扰而失联，也可以跟踪船舶。

stem: 第3小题：The alert information must include at least the ship’ s _________.
analysis:

警报信息至少必须包括船舶______信息。

【参考答案】B. 位置和识别

gl_tigan:
The system is intended for transmitting the security alert when the ship is under attack by pirates, terrorists, etc. It notifies the preset flag administration on land that the ship is under threat, without generating any audio/visual alarms to prevent others onboard from sensing that a security alert is transmitted. Its multi-addressed transmission function enables the transmission of the reports to the ship owner as well as to the flag administration. 

The information transmitted includes ship’ s current position and identification. Ship’ s position, obtained by using the built-in GPS receiver, is sent at regular intervals so that the flag administration and the ship owner are kept informed of the position of the ship. 

An optional backup battery is available to drive the system up to five days for continual data transmission. Furthermore, its polling function enables the tracking of a ship even after the ship loses communication due to the disturbances caused by pirates.

option.C: has less fuctions than the ones in use today
option.D: has no difference compared with in use ones

stem: 第1小题：The new IBS ______.
analysis: 新IBS______。B. 更先进
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan:
Exceptional operational performance is an ever-increasing requirement of today’s ship owners. Some of the most significant elements of operational performance include risk reduction and navigational safety. Many ship systems in use today tend to overwhelm ship’s officers with on-screen information, while only a fraction of the information presented is useful at any given time. This tends to degrade operational performance and prolong the learning process unnecessarily. This IBS is designed to assist the navigator in selecting information that is deemed relevant to the operational situation by collecting, processing and presenting navigational and/or other relevant data, without cluttering the displays with other information that may not be needed at that moment.

 This IBS approach to navigation and integrated bridges is different from all others, and is based on a solid background of system integration expertise, sea-going experience and innovative engineering.
gl_analysis:
今天，船东不断追求着船舶卓越的操作性能。操纵性能中最重要的因素包括降低风险和航行安全。如今的许多船舶系统提供大量的屏幕信息，使得船舶驾驶员应接不暇，但事实上其中只有一小部分信息在任何特定时间有用。这种情况可能会影响船舶操作性能，并不必要地延长学习过程。本IBS设计可通过收集、加工和呈现航行和/或其他相关数据，协助船员选择与操作情景相关的信息，且不会出现此刻不需要的信息而影响当前显示。

IBS对航行和综合驾驶台的作用与所有其他设备不同，它基于系统综合专业知识、海上经历和创新工程三者合一的扎实基础。

option.B: presenting data relevant to the operational situation
option.C: cluttering the displays with other information that may not be needed
option.D: selecting information irrelevant the operational situation at that moment

stem: 第1小题：The STRESS belongs to ______.
analysis: 压力属于______。C. 人为因素
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan: Human factors account for approximately 80% of accidents. The training of BRM is to reduce the risk of accidents at sea with focus on casualty prevention and human error. BRM training will trig an automatic response in the individual with regard to taking actions in which the decisions made in advance have been evaluated in terms of safety and potential outcomes and furthermore have been conveyed clearly to all other parties involved. The training of BRM will, through case studies and theory learning, make officers aware of the human factors, including stress, which cause avoidable accidents. This is to create a greater awareness about the different areas of responsibility and working situations with regard to deck and engine room and illustrate the possibilities in a dual concept. The aim is achieved by employing the use of simulators to train and observe and ensure that the officers keep a high standard of competence within BRM principles.
gl_analysis: 人为因素约占事故起因的80%。BRM培训关注防止伤亡和人为失误，旨在降低海上事故风险。BRM培训会激发个人对所做决策做出自动响应，驱使其根据安全和潜在结果预先进行评估，并进一步将该决策明确传达给所有其他相关方。通过案例研究和理论学习，BRM培训将帮助驾驶员认识到包括压力在内的诸多人为因素所造成的事故是可以避免的。这样可对甲板部和轮机部不同领域责任和工作情况提高意识，并以双重概念图解责任。通过使用模拟器培训和观察，确保驾驶员根据BRM原则保持高适任标准，助力目标达成。

stem: Integrated Bridgeand Navigation Systems (IBS/INS) provide excellent performance and reliable navigation under all conditions by ______.

gl_tigan:
Crewmembers and other personnel onboard must familiarize themselves with the Muster List and Emergency Instructions posted up in the crew’s quarters and other conspicuous places. 

The Muster list specifies details of the general emergency alarm signal and also action to be taken by crew and passengers when this alarm is sounded; specifies how the order to abandon ship shall be given; shows the duties assigned to the different members of the crew in connection with the closing of various doors and mechanisms, the equipping of the lifeboats and buoyant apparatus, the general preparation of any other boats, buoyant apparatus, inflatable life rafts and all other matters, and the extinction of fire; specifies which officers are assigned to ensure that life-saving and fire-fighting appliances are maintained in good conditions and are ready for immediate use; specifies definite signals for calling all members of the crew to their boat and fire stations and shall give full particulars of these signals.
gl_analysis:
船员和船上其他人员必须使其自己熟悉张贴在船员生活区和其他显眼的位置的《应变部署表》和《紧急情况指示》。

应变部署表规定了全船通用报警信号的细节，以及发出警报时，船员及乘客所应采取的行动;规定了如何下达弃船命令; 规定了分配给不同船员的职责，包括各种门和机械装置的关闭、艇和救生浮具中属具配置、任何其他救生艇、救生设备、充气救生筏和所有其他物品的一般准备，以及灭火;指定安排哪些人员去确保救生和消防设备的良好维护，并随时可用;指定明确的信号，以集合所有船员到其救生站点和消防站点，并须提供这些信号的详细数据。

stem: 第1小题：If the loss of contents of an individual cylinder exceeds_________, the cylinder should be recharged.
analysis:
解析：如果单个钢瓶中灭火剂的含量消耗【10%】以上，钢瓶则需要重新充灌。

【参考答案】B. 10%
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan:
The quantity of fire extinguishing medium should be checked at intervals not exceeding two years. In case the loss of contents of the system as a whole or of an individual part or unit of the system exceeds 10%, the system or the individual part or unit of the system should be recharged. The chemical composition of foam medium used in fixed fire extinguishing systems should be tested no later than three years after the date it was installed on board and thereafter at yearly intervals. 

At least 10% of the pressure vessels containing fire extinguishing medium should be hydrostatically tested no later than 10 years from the date of the completion of their initial testing following their construction and thereafter 10% of the pressure vessels should be hydrostatically tested during each 10 years period. 

The Department is willing to consider and approve alternative schemes of hydrostatic testing. The control valves of fixed fire extinguishing systems should be internally inspected at interval not exceeding 5 years. The flexible hoses should be replaced at the intervals not exceeding every 10 years.
gl_analysis:
灭火剂的数量检查的时间间隔不应超过两年。如果（灭火）系统整体或系统单个部分或系统单元的灭火剂消耗超过10%，则（灭火）系统整体或系统单个部分或系统单元应重新充灌。固定灭火系统中使用的泡沫的化学成分应在不迟于安装后的三年内进行检测，此后每隔一年进行一次检测。

至少10%的包含灭火剂的负压容器，应在其建成后完成初试的日期后， 10年内进行静水力测试，并且此后每隔10年进行一次静水力测试。

本部门将会考虑和批准其他的静水力试验方案。固定灭火系统的控制阀应以不超过5年的间隔进行内部检查。（消防）软管的更换间隔不超过10年。

至少10%的包含灭火剂的负压容器，应在其建成后完成初试的日期后， 10年内进行静水力测试，并且此后每隔10年进行一次静水力测试。

本部门将会考虑和批准其他的静水力试验方案。固定灭火系统的控制阀应以不超过5年的间隔进行内部检查。（消防）软管的更换间隔不超过10年。

stem: 第1小题：The purpose of checking the course steered, position and speed is _________.
analysis: 解析：检查助航设备的目的是【确保船舶按照计划航线航行】。
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区
gl_tigan:
During the watch the course steered, position and speed shall be checked at sufficiently frequent intervals, using any available navigational aids necessary, to ensure the ship follows the planned course. The officer in charge of the navigational watch shall have full knowledge of the location and operation of all safety and navigational equipment on board the ship and shall be aware and take account of the operating limitations of such equipment. The officer in charge of the navigational watch shall not be assigned or undertake any duties which would interfere with the safe navigation of the ship. Officers of the navigational watch shall make the most effective use of all navigational equipment at their disposal. 

When using radar, the officer in charge of the navigational watch shall bear in mind the necessity to comply at all times with the provisions on the use of radar contained in the International Regulations for Preventing Collisions at Sea, in force.
gl_analysis: 值班期间，必要时应使用一切可用的助航设备，以足够频繁的间隔检查船位和船速，以确保船舶按照计划航线航行。负责值航行班的驾驶员应充分了解船上所有安全和助航设备的位置和操作情况，并应意识到并考虑到这些设备的操作局限性。值航行班的驾驶员不应被指派或承担任何妨碍船舶安全航行的任务。负责值航行班的驾驶员应当最有效地利用他们可使用的一切助航设备。在使用雷达时，负责值航行班的驾驶员应牢记必须始终遵守现行的《国际海上避碰规则》中有关使用雷达的规定。

stem: 第1小题：When can the officer in charge of the navigational watch withdraw the bridge?
analysis:
解析：什么时候负责值航行班的驾驶员可以离开驾驶台？【另一位驾驶员已经正式接班。】

什么时候值班驾驶员可以离开驾驶台？

【参考答案】B. 另一位驾驶员已经正式接班
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan:
The officer in charge of the navigational watch shall: 

• 1 keep the watch on the bridge; 

• 2 in no circumstances leave the bridge until properly relieved; and 

• 3 continue to be responsible for the safe navigation of the ship, despite the presence of the master on the bridge, until informed specifically that the master has assumed that responsibility and this is mutually understood. 

During the watch, the course steered, position and speed shall be checked at sufficiently frequent intervals, using any available navigational aids necessary, to ensure that the ship follows the planned course. 

The officer in charge of the navigational watch shall have full knowledge of the location and operation of all safety and navigational equipment on board the ship and shall be aware and take account of the operating limitations of such equipment.
gl_analysis:
负责航行值班的人员应当:

•1在驾驶台保持值班;

•2 在正式交班之前，任何情况下均不得离开驾驶台;

•3 即使船长在驾驶台，继续对船舶安全航行负责，直至被专门告知，船长已承担此责任并且双方均彼此明悉。

在值班期间，应使用任何可用的必要助航设备，以足够频繁的间隔检查航向、船位和船速，以确保船舶按照计划航线航行。

负责值航行班的驾驶员应充分了解船上所有安全和助航设备的位置和操作情况，并应意识到并考虑到这些设备的操作局限性。

在值班期间，应使用任何可用的必要助航设备，以足够频繁的间隔检查航向、船位和船速，以确保船舶按照计划航线航行。

负责值航行班的驾驶员应充分了解船上所有安全和助航设备的位置和操作情况，并应意识到并考虑到这些设备的操作局限性。

stem: 第1小题：The main topic of this passage about the responsibilities of the officers during_________.
analysis:
解析：本文的主题是【交接班】期间驾驶员的职责。

文章主题与______有关。

【参考答案】A. 驾驶员交接班职责
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan:
The officer of the watch should not hand over the watch to the relieving officer if he has any reason to believe that the latter is apparently under any disability which would preclude him from carrying out his duties effectively. If in doubt, the officer of the watch should inform the master accordingly. 

The relieving officer should not take over the watch until his vision is fully adjusted to the light conditions and he has personally satisfied himself regarding: (1) standing orders; (2) the position, course, speed and draught of the vessel; (3) prevailing and predicted tides, currents, weather, visibility and the effect of these factors upon course and speed; and (4) the navigational situation. 

If at the time the officer of the watch is to be relieved a man oeuvre or other action to avoid any hazard is taking place, the relief of the officer should be deferred until such action is completed.
gl_analysis:
负责航行值班的驾驶员，如果有理由相信来接班驾驶员明显不能有效地履行其职责，则不应向其交班，如不确定，值班驾驶员应通知船长。

接班驾驶员在其视力未完全调节到适应光线条件以前，不应接班，并且在接班前，应亲自搞清本船的：（1）常规命令；（2）船位、航向、船速及吃水；（3）盛行和预测的潮汐、水流、天气、能见度，以及这些因素对航向和速度的影响; (4)航行情况。

负责航行值班的驾驶员换班时，如果，正在进行避免任何危险的操纵或行动，交接班将会推迟至该行动结束。

如值班驾驶员无法确定接班员是否适于接班，应首先______。

【参考答案】B. 通知船长

stem: When deciding the composition of the watch on the bridge, which may NOT be taken intoaccount?
analysis:
解析：此题为公开题库第三版新增题目。在决定驾驶台值班构成时，哪一个可能不被采用？驾驶台有时应无人看管。unattended 无人看管的；

《STCW规则》第A-VIII/2节海上值班部分规定，在决定可能包括合格的普通船员在内的驾驶台值班组成时，应特别考虑下列因素：

（1）在任何时候，驾驶台不许无人值守；

（2）天气情况、能见度以及是否白天或黑夜；

（3）接近航行危险物可能需要负责航行值班的高级船员执行额外的航行职责；

（4）助航仪器，如电子海图显示与信息系统（ECDIS）、雷达或电子定位仪以及任何其他影响船舶安全航行的设备的使用和工作状态；

（5）船上是否装有自动操舵装置（Automatic steering）；

（6）是否需要执行无线电职责；

（7）装备在驾驶台上的无人机舱（USM）控制装置、警报和指示器及其使用程序和局限性；

（8）特殊的操作环境可能导致对航行值班的出乎寻常的任何要求。

stem: 第1小题：______ is an inert material.
analysis: ______是惰性材料。B. 水泥
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan: Water is the obvious medium to be used when dealing with a spillage on board a ship. It is recommended in the majority of cases to be used in copious quantities to wash the spillage overboard. However，certain dangerous goods react violently with water-producing flammable and toxic vapours. Others，for example marine pollutants，will produce pollution if washed overboard. The term “copious quantities of water” used within the SPILLAGE Schedules refers to the minimum total quantities of water provided for optimal fire-fighting with four jets as defined by SOLAS Chapter II-2 Regulation 4 construction requirements. Master and crew should consider practical limitations at specific stowage locations in this respect. Inert material should be used for spillages where it would be dangerous to use water. The inert material should be dry. Sawdust should not be used as it is liable to be ignited by ignition sources or in contact with a number of substances. Cement may be used as an inert material for barricading.
gl_analysis: 船上应对溢漏时，水是最显而易见的媒介。通常在绝大多数情况下，都建议使用大量的水将溢漏物冲到舷外。但是，某些危险货会与由水产生的易燃和有毒气体发生剧烈的化学反应。其他物质，如海洋污染物，若冲到舷外会导致污染。溢漏应急程序中所使用的“大量的水”一词指SOLAS公约第II-2章第4条结构要求中规定的使用4股水流进行消防的最佳状态下所需的最低总量的水。船长和船员应就此方面考虑在货物特定积载位置的可行性限制。如使用水可能导致危险的话，应使用惰性材料应对溢漏。惰性材料应保持干燥。不要使用锯末，因其易于被火源引燃，或因与其他物质接触而燃烧。设置防火障碍时，水泥可作为惰性材料使用。

stem: In writing up the log book at the end of your watch and you make an error,which of the followings is the way to correct the error?
analysis: 解析：此题为公开题库第三版新增题目。在值班结束填写航海日志期间，你填错了一项。以下哪种方式是改正错误的正确方式？用一条线将错误划掉，然后写下正确的内容。【重点词汇】log book航海日志；error错误；correct改正；neatly工整地；erase擦除；rewrite重写；remove撕掉、清楚；entry填写内容；blot out抹去、消除；completely完整地、完全地

stem: 第1小题：In this drill, captain summons all crew at the _________.
analysis:
解析：在本次演习中，船长在【主甲板】集合所有船员。

演习中，船长召集所有船员在主甲板集合。

【参考答案】A
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan:
1340 Send general alarm and announce damage control drill by PA and informed E/R for standby; 

1342 All crewmembers mustered at main deck and C/O brief the damage condition: assume that vessel is damage and down by head now; 

1345 Reduce ship’s speed, check ship’s position, and sound all tanks and bilges to monitor condition; 

1347 C/O report to master that found one crack at FPT by unknown reason, sea water flood in; 

inform E/R commence pumping out water; Engine Dep. crew monitor M/E, G/E, shaft system; 

close watertight doors and unnecessary valves as per C/E’s instruction; 

1348 Evaluate the damage situation as per ship damage stability plan, and prepare for beach if necessary and permit; 

1350 seek assistance from the nearby vessel if necessary; 

1400 send damage report to company and seek for guidance, and initial notification to relevant parties if necessary; 

1410 evaluate the drill; 

1412 finish damage control drill. 

Deficiencies: 

1. During damage control drill, damage control plan not fully complied; 

2. The safety message not sent by VHF.
gl_analysis:
1340 由公共广播系统发出全船通用报警并通知堵漏演习，通知机舱待命;

1342 所有船员到主甲板集合，大副简要介绍破损情况:假定船已受损，并且现在船首下降;

1345 减速，测船位，检查各舱及污水井，以监控（进水）情况；

1347 轮机长向船长报告，发现不明原因导致的艏尖舱出现一条裂缝，海水涌进; 通知电机工开始排水;轮机部全体人员监控主机、发电机、轴系统; 按照轮机长的指示关闭水密门和不必要的阀门;

1348 根据船舶破损控制图评估破损情况，情况允许且必要的话，做好抢滩准备;

1350 必要时向附近船舶求助;

1400向公司发送破损报告并寻求指导，必要时向相关方进行初步通知;

1410评估演习;

1412完成堵漏演习。

不足之处:

1. 在堵漏演习中，破损控制计划未完全执行;

2. 不是由甚高频发送的安全信息。

stem: 第1小题：Crew mustered at designed area with _________minutes after the drill signal send out.
analysis:
解析：演习信号发出【2】分钟后，船员到指定位置集合。

演习信号发出______分钟后，全体船员在指定区域集合。

【参考答案】B. 2
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan:
1500 Sound fire-fighting drill alarm and followed by oil spill drill announcement via PA, and mock engine room on fire; 

1502 crew mustered at engine room, C/E have a roll call and brief fire situation, stop engine and secure all engine room ventilator; 

1504 start emergency fire pump and connect hoses for standby; 

1507 Fireman detected fire at incinerator area and report to C/E and C/O; 

1510 C/E report to master, master order use fixed foam system to extinguish the fire; 

1511 C/E order evacuate engine room and have a roll call to ensure no crew remain at engine room; 

1513 release the fixed foam system to engine room as fire control plan; 

1518 keep all ventilators close and monitor the fire situation; 

1530 fireman detects the fire again, ensure fire extinguished; 

1531 ventilate all engine room; 

1545 evaluate fire-fighting drill; train crew on how to release fixed foam system; and 1548 finish drill, crew dismissed. 

Deficiencies: 

• When the emergency fire pump started, the flange of emergency fire pump leaking water, and the leakage flange was repaired later; and 

• The new-joined crew did not familiar with remote control of fire pump.
gl_analysis:
1500 发出消防演习报警，随后通过公共广播系统播送溢油演习的通知，并模拟机舱着火;

1502 船员在机舱集合，轮机长点名并简要介绍火灾情况，停车并关闭机舱所有通风;

1504启动应急消防泵，并连接软管以备用;

1507消防员探到焚化炉区域有火情，并向轮机长和大副报告;

1510 轮机长向船长报告，船长命令使用固定泡沫系统灭火;

1511 轮机长命令撤离机舱，并点名以确保机舱内没有船员;

1513按照防火控制图将固定泡沫系统释放到机舱;

1518 保持所有通风闭并监控火情;

1530消防员再次探测火情，确保火已熄灭;

1531全机舱通风;

1545评估消防演习;就如何释放固定泡沫系统进行船员培训;并于1548分完成演习，全员解散。

不足之处:

•应急消防泵启动时，应急消防泵法兰漏水，稍后对漏水法兰进行了修复; 

•新船员不熟悉消防泵的远程控制。

1513按照防火控制图将固定泡沫系统释放到机舱;

1518 保持所有通风闭并监控火情;

1530消防员再次探测火情，确保火已熄灭;

1531全机舱通风;

1545评估消防演习;就如何释放固定泡沫系统进行船员培训;并于1548分完成演习，全员解散。

•新船员不熟悉消防泵的远程控制。

1504 start emergency fire pump and connect hoses for standby; 

1507 Fireman detected fire at incinerator area and report to C/E and C/O; 

1510 C/E report to master, master order use fixed foam system to extinguish the fire; 

1511 C/E order evacuate engine room and have a roll call to ensure no crew remain at engine room; 

1513 release the fixed foam system to engine room as fire control plan; 

1518 keep all ventilators close and monitor the fire situation; 

1530 fireman detects the fire again, ensure fire extinguished; 

1531 ventilate all engine room; 

1545 evaluate fire-fighting drill; train crew on how to release fixed foam system; and 1548 finish drill, crew dismissed. 

Deficiencies: 

• When the emergency fire pump started, the flange of emergency fire pump leaking water, and the leakage flange was repaired later; and 

• The new-joined crew did not familiar with remote control of fire pump.

stem: 第1小题：The main purpose of “MOB button” at GPS is to _________.
analysis:
解析：GPS上的“人员落水按钮”的主要用途是【标绘人员落水的位置】。

GPS上“MOB button”的主要作用是______。

【参考答案】C. 记录落水人员位置
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan:
1720 simulate man overboard on port deck, the finder throw a lifebuoy to him; call out “Man Over Board” ask for help at loud voice, report to bridge; 

1721 master sound general alarm, broadcast man overboard drill through the public addresser, push MOB button on GPS; 

1722 Master start Williamson turn to search the overboard crew; 

1723 Crew mustered on station, C/O have a roll call, brief man overboard situation and check the condition of donning life jacket; 

1736 Swung out rescue boat to boat deck and crew embarked with SART and portable VHF; start and test boat engine found satisfactory; 

1738 located overboard crew at sea and keep in sight, and launch rescue boat as required; 

1748 rescue boat take crew back from water; give first aid on boat deck; 

1750 restore rescue boat in position; secure rescue boat; and 

1751 Evaluate Drill; 

1752 finish Drill 

Non-conformities:
gl_analysis:
1720 模拟左舷甲板人员落水，发现者扔给他一个救生圈；大呼“有人落水”，寻求帮助，向驾驶台报告。

 1721 船长发出全船通用报警，通过公共广播系统播送人员落水演习（要求），按下GPS上的人员落水按钮。

1722 船长开始通过威廉逊旋回搜救落水船员。

1723 全体船员集合，大副点名，简要介绍人员落水的情况，并检查救生衣的穿戴状况。

1736 将救助艇摆至等艇甲板，船员带着搜救雷达应答器与甚高频登艇；启动并测试艇机，发现一切正常。

1738 找到落水船员并锁定目标，根据要求放艇。

1748 救助艇从水中将船员从水中带回，并在艇甲板进行急救。

1750 将救助艇放回原处，并系固。

1751 评估本次演习。

1752 完成演习。

stem: 第1小题：_________is used to put out the fire.
analysis:
解析：【便携式二氧化碳灭火器】被用来灭火。

______用于灭火。

【参考答案】C. 手提式二氧化碳灭火器
zhiwei: 甲类,3000总吨及以上,无限航区,500-3000总吨
gl_tigan: Read the shipboard emergency drills record below and answer the following questions.
gl_analysis:
1500 一位值班一水发现生活区左舷侧储藏室中冒烟，大喊“生活区左舷侧着火了”，同时，通知值班驾驶员和船长。

1501 船长到驾驶台并发出消防报警（持续1分钟的短声以及五长声的通用报警）。

1502 所有船员带着消防设施到集合站点集合，然后大副点名（以确定是否有船员失踪），并且确认好各位船员的职责，然后，启动消防泵，海水从两根消防软管中喷出。急救队待命。

1503-1506 三副检查了消防员装备，对讲机，呼吸器，以及其他个人救生设备，以确保处于良好状态。隔离队将生活区左舷侧的可燃物移除，关闭着火区的水密门，关闭生活区左舷侧房间的通风及电源。消防员穿好装备。

1507 佩戴好消防员装备的消防员进入生活区左舷侧房间并且探测火情，并且将两根消防软管中的海水喷洒到生活区左舷侧房间的外墙，隔离队再次检查水密门，通风，并且，三副检查了接下来的必要的弃船安排（包括救生艇），以备随时可用。

1510 消防员报告：有些碎布着火。火情较小，仅用便携式灭火器即可灭火。无人员受伤。

1511 大副向船长报告并请求去灭火，经船长确认后，大副指挥消防员用便携式二氧化碳灭火器灭掉生活区左舷侧房间的着火。

1516 火由携式二氧化碳灭火器灭掉。

1520 灭火后，消防员复查火情，并报给大副，火情未复燃。大副报给船长，船长命令大副继续监控火情，避免火情复燃。然后根据指挥，进行通风。

1525-1530 充分通风后，大副检查氧气和可爆性，（氧气含量20.9%，可燃气体，无）。

1535 大副向船长报告（氧气含量20.9%，可燃气体，无），船长下令清扫舱室。

1539 生活区左舷侧房间已清扫。留一水值班。大副讲解有关灭火的知识，并评估本次演习。

1540 船长发出“解散信号”（一长声），演习结束。
